answer:
You can use our Influenza (Flu) Clinic Locator to find a list of flu clinics in your area. Most clinics are drop-in; this information is available when you click on the clinic. 
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## You can use our Influenza (Flu) Clinic Locator to find a list of flu clinics in your area.

Most clinics are drop-in;
## this information is available when you click on the clinic.

Immunization Nurse
question: Hello, I am inquiring about influenzas vaccines schedule for 2019, BC Kamloops. Had it already scheduled? Do I need to book appointment?
question_variation_1: vaccine schedule for bc kamloops vaccines
question_variation_2: vaccine schedule for 2019 bc chamloops vaccine schedule
